app.name: version
app.documentation: The version of the app according to the app's own version schedule; often this is a Git commit identifier

app.name: url
app.documentation: The home page of the application

app.name: os
app.documentation: The operating system that ran the application

app.name: interpreter
app.documentation: If applicable, the name of the interpreter (Matlab, python3, etc)

app.name: interpreter_version
app.documentation: If applicable, the version of the interpreter
